author: liuxiaoyuyuyu
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a vertex smearing for 2025 OO MC. Beamspot position derived from runs 394153 to 394217, excluding runs with VdM scans, i,e 394154 and 394217. BPIX barycentre location was officially provided by Tracker Alignment Group ([cmsTalk](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/TkAlignmentPixelPosition#Run2025_OO))

#### PR validation:

This PR has been modeled after similar PRs from 2025 for the pO vertex smearing: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48480
 
#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

We will need a backport for CMSSW_15_0_X
title: update a vertex smearing parameters for 2025 OO MC
